about_the_game:
*The Game is still in Early Development. Some features may change.*


Home to many and no one.
Bearer of fortune and misfortune alike.
The Wherehouse hungers.

Take charge of a lost soul that has happened across the contradiction that is the 'Wherehouse.'
With every life you tie to the fate of the Wherehouse, the Wherehouse grows stronger.
But as the Wherehouse strengthens, so does your bond. At least, while you're still alive.
Many lives will be lost to the Wherehouse, as many lives have been lost to the Wherehouse before.
Strengthen the Wherehouse and through its powerful bond, learn the secrets of the world of Lost Remnant and grow in power.
For the fortunes of the Wherehouse are yours.
While you still live.


  • A Point and Click Management game.
  • A Roguelite system of choosing a new character based on their 'origin.'
  • Nurture and feed the Wherehouse with the blood (And organs) of monsters (and other entities) you slay.
  • Find unique relics to empower your character. (At least, until they succumb to their own mortality.)
  • Discover the deep lore of the world of Lost Remnant.
  • Discern the secrets to 'origin' characters that aren't human.
  • Explore several biomes with numerous maps, as you hunt monsters for the sake of the Wherehouse.
  • Unearth lost knowledge and piece together the clues you find.
  • The 3rd game in the Lost Remnant series. (But playing the previous games is not required, just encouraged.)
